title: FNB Pandora's Mason, ULA's Megenhardt, on Cleveland Fed (Audio)
itunes:title: FNB Pandora's Mason, ULA's Megenhardt, on Cleveland Fed (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: ROUNDTABLE: Cleveland Fed board members Todd Mason, CEO of First National Bank of Pandora, and David Megenhardt, Executive Director of the United Labor Agency, discuss the Fed, banking and Dodd-Frank, and the labor market

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
